name: Simple yet configurable NodeMCU temperature nodes
tagline: Small easy to configure temperature nodes using NodeMCU, DHT22, ThingSpeak, and HighCharts.
body:
Again, my new office is too hot or cold.

My friend Gavin (https://github.com/Phrogz) suggested I would collect proof to ask the landlord to fix it, hence this repository.

HW Components:
* NodeMCU
* DHT22

SW Features:
* ThingSpeak
* HighCharts
* Easy node config and WiFi setup without coding
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
